name: Starship Operator
description:
Use Firefox or Chrome for best experiense. Game may work slow on Safari.

"Starship Operator" is a spaceship simulator with 30 various levels to complete. Rush to the finish line, navigate through labyrinths, kill enemy ships or do whatever mission objective says. Just be careful - space won't forgive you even a slightest mistake.
Good luck!

Keys:
[up] - accelerate
[down] - slow down
[left] - rotate counter-clockwise
[right] - rotate clockwise
[<] - move left
[>] - move right
[space] - open fire
[ctrl] - use FTL engine
